name: Shift Planner
description: Easily manage your team's shifts and payments on Notion.Shift Planner is a Notion template designed to help you organise your employees' working hours and manage payments. It is ideal for event managers, restaurants, pubs, hotels, and other businesses where shifts are essential to business operations.The Shift Planner template consists of two master and two supporting databases.
